records.name: Alert operator
records.description: Operator used to compare the result of the indicator with the alert threshold.

records.name: Alert threshold
records.description: Numeric value used to evaluate the records in the result set of the indicator and determine if an alert must be sent.

records.name: Measure
records.description: Python list of values to indicate measures names in the result set of the indicator.

records.name: Dimension
records.description: Python list of values to indicate dimensions names in the result set of the indicator.

records.name: Target
records.description: Name of the data source on which to evaluate the quality level of the data.

records.name: Target request
records.description: SQL query used to compute the result set of the indicator on the target data source.

records.name: Source
records.description: Name of the data source which serves as a reference to evaluate the quality level of the data.

records.name: Source request
records.description: SQL query used to compute the result set of the indicator on the source data source.

records.name: Distribution list
records.description: Python list of e-mail addresses to which alerts must be sent.
